name: Adventures of Sputnik - Sputnik Jam - October 2017
name_original: Adventures of Sputnik - Sputnik Jam - October 2017
description:
This is a short game where you are in control of Sputnik and must avoid asteroids and collect power ups to get as high a score as you can. It was made by myself and Elliot Chester for the 2017 Sputnik Jam.

https://twitter.com/chester_elliot

https://twitter.com/CharlieKinglake
